name: Upgrade: Scouting 1
description:
Completing this mission will unlock a permanent upgrade for all future expeditions.

Craft a Scouting Lens from high quality lenses and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: Reveals slightly more of the map around exit points and mission targets.

effect.u_message:
Somehow, you understand the statue is calling out for something that can strengthen its power.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: Reveals slightly more of the map around exit points and mission targets.
Your vision expands.  Future missions and exits will be scouted just a little better.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact will empower the island and unlock a permanent upgrade for all future runs.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED UPGRADE: Scouting 1

name: Upgrade: Landing 1
description:
Completing this mission will unlock a permanent upgrade for all future expeditions.

Craft a Landing Pad from common cushions and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: Reveal a bit more of the map around your landing point, and increase the warpcloak invisibility grace period at the start of each expedition to 70 seconds.

effect.u_message:
Somehow, you understand the statue is calling out for something that can strengthen its power.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: Reveal a bit more of the map around your landing point, and increase the warpcloak invisibility grace period at the start of each expedition to 70 seconds.
Your focus tightens.  Landing points will reveal more of the map, and your warpcloak will last 70 seconds at the beginning of every expedition.

name: Upgrade: Stability 1
description:
Completing this mission will unlock a permanent upgrade for all future expeditions.

Craft a Warped Tincture from experimental materials and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: You will begin every expedition with the ability to withstand 9 pulses instead of the default 8, allowing you to stay out 12.5% longer before warpsickness takes over.

effect.u_message:
Somehow, you understand the statue is calling out for something that can strengthen its power.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: You will begin every expedition with the ability to withstand 9 pulses instead of the default 8, allowing you to stay out 12.5% longer before warpsickness takes over.
Your resistance to the chaos of the warpstream increases.  In every future expedition, you will be able to endure an additional warp pulse and stay earthside longer.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact will empower the island and unlock a permanent upgrade for all future runs.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED UPGRADE: Stability 1

EFFECT: You will begin every expedition with the ability to withstand 10 pulses instead of the default 8, allowing you to stay out 25% longer before warpsickness takes over.

name: Unlock: Slaughter Missions
description:
Completing this mission will unlock a permanent upgrade for all future expeditions.

Craft the Vengeance of the Island from experimental materials and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: One special slaughter mission will be assigned during each expedition, rewarding warp shards if you kill a certain number of specifically targeted enemies before returning home.

effect.u_message:
Somehow, you understand the statue is calling out for something that can strengthen its power.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: One special slaughter mission will be assigned during each expedition, rewarding warp shards if you kill a certain number of specifically targeted enemies before returning home.

Bloodthirst surges through you like electricity.  The clarity of the world and its natural flow pierces your mind.
In every future expedition, you will be tasked to find and extinguish living entities that have absorbed warp.  Do this and you will be rewarded.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact will empower the island and unlock a permanent upgrade for all future runs.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED UPGRADE: Slaughter Missions

name: Unlock: Two Exits per Expedition
description:
Completing this mission will unlock a permanent upgrade for all future expeditions.

Craft an Escape Charm from experimental materials and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: Every expedition will now have two different locations you can exit from.

effect.u_message:
Somehow, you understand the statue is calling out for something that can strengthen its power.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: Every expedition will now have two different locations you can exit from.

You close your eyes and through the flow of turbulent warpstream, an invisible maze manifests.  A thousand potential passages brush smooth stone across your consciousness, and the meaning of this reality glimmers faintly, a dancing splinter of light in the distance.  You've been here before, you are here now, and you will be here again.
When you open your eyes, you're back where you began.  You haven't moved, but it feels as though the world has.

In every future expedition, you will now be able to find two different locations you can exit from.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact will empower the island and unlock a permanent upgrade for all future runs.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED UPGRADE: Two Exits per Expedition

name: Unlock: Three Exits per Expedition
description:
Completing this mission will unlock a permanent upgrade for all future expeditions.

Craft the Blindfold of Egress from experimental materials and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: Every expedition will now have three different locations you can exit from.

effect.u_message:
Somehow, you understand the statue is calling out for something that can strengthen its power.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: Every expedition will now have three different locations you can exit from.

Again you see in blindness, and before you stretches a vast invisible labyrinth beneath an empty sky.  You race forward, tracing paths spoken to you in dreams, and an origami spiderweb crumples and breathes out underfoot.  At last, at the seashell's center, lies the cornucopia's smallest door.
When at last you open your eyes, you find yourself where you began, unmoved, yet changed.

In every future expedition, you will now be able to find three different locations you can exit from.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact will empower the island and unlock a permanent upgrade for all future runs.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED UPGRADE: Three Exits per Expedition

name: Unlock: Expedition Missions
description:
Completing this mission will unlock a permanent upgrade for all future expeditions.

Craft a Warped Decree from experimental materials and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: Every expedition now offers a randomly assigned mission, which will reward you with valuable warp shards.  Completing a mission also extends the time left on current expedition by 1 warp pulse.

effect.u_message:
Somehow, you understand the statue is calling out for something that can strengthen its power.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: Every expedition now offers a randomly assigned mission, which will reward you with valuable warp shards.  Completing a mission also extends the time left on current expedition by 1 warp pulse.

The island speaks in your head using words you cannot translate yet already understand.  Its wishes are your commands.
In every future expedition, you will now be given a randomly generated mission, from which you can earn valuable warp shards.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact will empower the island and unlock a permanent upgrade for all future runs.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED UPGRADE: Expedition Missions

name: Unlock: Two Missions per Expedition
description:
Completing this mission will unlock a permanent upgrade for all future expeditions.

Craft Order's Blade from experimental materials and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: Every expedition will now have 2 different randomly assigned missions, increasing the possibility for earning warp shards.  Completing a mission also extends the time left on current expedition by 1 warp pulse.

effect.u_message:
Somehow, you understand the statue is calling out for something that can strengthen its power.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: Every expedition will now have 2 different randomly assigned missions, increasing the possibility for earning warp shards.  Completing a mission also extends the time left on current expedition by 1 warp pulse.

Those who disturb the warpstream must be put down.  There is no cruelty in this.  It is the order of the Island, and it will be kept.
In every future expedition, you will now be given 2 random missions.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact will empower the island and unlock a permanent upgrade for all future runs.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED UPGRADE: Two Missions per Expedition

name: Unlock: Three Missions per Expedition
description:
Completing this mission will unlock a permanent upgrade for all future expeditions.

Craft the Hand of the Island from experimental materials and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: Every expedition will now have 3 different randomly assigned missions, increasing the possibility for earning warp shards.  Completing a mission also extends the time left on current expedition by 1 warp pulse.

effect.u_message:
Somehow, you understand the statue is calling out for something that can strengthen its power.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: Every expedition will now have 3 different randomly assigned missions, increasing the possibility for earning warp shards.  Completing a mission also extends the time left on current expedition by 1 warp pulse.

Your strength is an extension of the island's will.  Let order be maintained.
In every future expedition, you will now be given 3 random missions.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact will empower the island and unlock a permanent upgrade for all future runs.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED UPGRADE: Three Missions per Expedition

name: Unlock: Harder Missions
description:
Completing this mission will unlock a permanent upgrade for all future expeditions.

Craft an Ordinator's Sigil from experimental materials and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: New and more challenging types of missions are available to be randomly assigned in every expedition.  Harder missions will reward many more warp shards.

effect.u_message:
Somehow, you understand the statue is calling out for something that can strengthen its power.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: New and more challenging types of missions are available to be randomly assigned in every expedition.  Harder missions will reward many more warp shards.

Greater trespasses against the flow of the warpstream reveal themselves to you.  This interference cannot go unpunished.
The missions you are randomly assigned in each expedition are more varied, and can now pull from harder and more rewarding challenges.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact will empower the island and unlock a permanent upgrade for all future runs.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED UPGRADE: Harder Missions

name: Unlock: Hardest Missions
description:
Completing this mission will unlock a permanent upgrade for all future expeditions.

Craft the Will of the Island from experimental materials and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: New and even more challenging types of missions are available to be randomly assigned in every expedition.  Harder missions will reward many more warp shards.

effect.u_message:
Somehow, you understand the statue is calling out for something that can strengthen its power.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: New and even more challenging types of missions are available to be randomly assigned in every expedition.  Harder missions will reward many more warp shards.

The greatest trespasses against the island now glimmer in the dark, guiding your hand as a tool of order.  Return these chaotic energies to the tranquility of the warpstream.
The missions you are randomly assigned in each expedition are even more varied, and can now pull from the hardest and most rewarding challenges.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact will empower the island and unlock a permanent upgrade for all future runs.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED UPGRADE: Hardest Missions

name: Island Rank Up 1
description:
Completing this mission ascends you to a new rank.

Craft the Proof of Determination from experimental materials and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: Reach Rank 1.  Some upgrades and unlocks will not be available until you have ranked up.  You will also instantly learn several new warp-related crafting recipes.

effect.u_message:
You are ready to ascend to a higher tier of strength and ability.  Complete this trial and prove yourself, and you will discover new powers for yourself and the island.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: Reach Rank 1.  Some upgrades and unlocks will not be available until you have ranked up.  You will also instantly learn several new warp-related crafting recipes.

You have proved your ability to survive to the island, to the warpstream, and to yourself.
More unlockable upgrades will be available as you progress, and you may experience exits and targets in new locations.

Your mind expands.  You have learned to craft:
Materialize random artifact
Vortex token
Warped hauler's harness
Warped animal carrier

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact will empower the island and unlock a permanent upgrade for all future runs.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED UPGRADE: Island Rank Up 1

name: Island Rank Up 2
description:
Completing this mission ascends you to a new rank.

Craft the Proof of Determination from experimental materials and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: Reach Rank 2.  Some upgrades and unlocks will not be available until you have ranked up.  You will also instantly learn several new warp-related crafting recipes.

effect.u_message:
You are ready to ascend to a higher tier of strength and ability.  Complete this trial and prove yourself, and you will discover new powers for yourself and the island.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: Reach Rank 2.  Some upgrades and unlocks will not be available until you have ranked up.  You will also instantly learn several new warp-related crafting recipes.

That you are still here, fighting on, makes your determination clear.  This new existence is strange and unpredictable, but you can adapt.  It's how you made it this far, and you're not about to stop now.
More unlockable upgrades will be available as you progress, and you may experience exits and targets in new locations.

Your mind expands.  You have learned to craft:
Homeward mote
Autodoc copyplate

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact will empower the island and unlock a permanent upgrade for all future runs.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED UPGRADE: Island Rank Up 2

name: Unlock: Large Expeditions
description:
Completing this mission will unlock a permanent upgrade for all future expeditions.

Craft a Warped Hourglass from experimental materials and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: You will be able to select Large Expeditions when leaving via the warp obelisk.  Large Expeditions last 2x as long, but mission targets and exit points are significantly farther away.

effect.u_message:
With some success under your belt, you feel ready to tackle more ambitious expeditions, and the island seems to know it.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: You will be able to select Large Expeditions when leaving via the warp obelisk.  Large Expeditions last 2x as long, but mission targets and exit points are significantly farther away.

You are ready for a longer haul.
Large Expeditions are now available at the warp obelisk.  Exits and missions will be farther away, but you will have twice as long to spend earthside.  Use this time wisely, and set your sights on bigger targets.  What will you do with your newfound time?

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact will empower the island and unlock a permanent upgrade for all future runs.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED UPGRADE: Large Expeditions

name: Unlock: Extended Expeditions
description:
Completing this mission will unlock a permanent upgrade for all future expeditions.

Craft the Watch of Flowing Time from experimental materials and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: You will be able to select Extended Expeditions when leaving via the warp obelisk.  Extended Expeditions last 3x as long, but mission targets and exit points are significantly farther away.

effect.u_message:
You've seen enough safe returns to know your way around an expedition.  Now if you could spend even more time earthside, you'd be able to tackle even bigger and more ambitious goals.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: You will be able to select Extended Expeditions when leaving via the warp obelisk.  Extended Expeditions last 3x as long, but mission targets and exit points are much farther away.

You're in it to win it, and are prepared to take a long time exploring the world below.
Extended Expeditions are now available at the warp obelisk.  Exits and missions will be much farther away, but you will have three times as long to spend earthside.  Pack supplies for a day trip and be sure to bring plenty of storage space.  Where will you go with your newfound time?

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact will empower the island and unlock a permanent upgrade for all future runs.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED UPGRADE: Extended Expeditions

name: Unlock Start Location: Basements
description:
Completing this mission will unlock a new possible location to begin future expeditions.

Craft the Basement Locator from experimental materials and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: You will be able to select random Basement starts when leaving via the warp obelisk.

effect.u_message:
Being guaranteed to start in a town or city would cut down on your hikes through the wilderness.  But popping down in the middle of the street with no warning could really attract hordes.  Basements aren't always safe, but they're probably safer than walking down Main in broad daylight, and might be a good location to begin future expeditions.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: You will be able to select random Basement starts when leaving via the warp obelisk.
When leaving from the warp obelisk, you can now guarantee you will begin your expedition in a basement.  Not glamorous, but at least it ensures you won't be stranded out in some desolate field.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact will empower the island and unlock a permanent upgrade for all future runs.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED UPGRADE: Unlock Start Location: Basements

name: Unlock Start Location: Roofs
description:
Completing this mission will unlock a new possible location to begin future expeditions.

Craft the Rooftop Locator from experimental materials and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: You will be able to select random Rooftop starts when leaving via the warp obelisk.

effect.u_message:
If basements aren't cutting it, there's always rooftops.  Starting one floor up will give you a good vantage and relative safety from the busy streets while still ensuring you begin your expedition in a town or city.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: You will be able to select random Rooftop starts when leaving via the warp obelisk.  In case you need to make a quick descent, bear in mind that the warpcloak effect you have briefly at the start of each expedition prevents fall damage.

When leaving from the warp obelisk, you can now guarantee you will begin your expedition on some rooftop.  Dangerous, perhaps, but it ensures proximity to points of interest, and besides, there are all kinds of buildings this might land you on.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact will empower the island and unlock a permanent upgrade for all future runs.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED UPGRADE: Unlock Start Location: Roofs

name: Unlock Start Location: Labs
description:
Completing this mission will unlock a new possible location to begin future expeditions.

Craft the Laboratory Locator from experimental materials and miscellaneous parts.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

EFFECT: You will be able to select random Labs starts when leaving via the warp obelisk.

effect.u_message:
Labs are rare and valuable finds, and clearing them out will take the better part of a long expedition.  It would be much so easier if you could start right outside one!
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

EFFECT: You will be able to select random Lab starts when leaving via the warp obelisk.  This expedition type is unique in that it will require a Labs Catalyst in your inventory when you select the expedition, which will then be consumed on leaving.

With this upgrade, you're guaranteed to begin your expedition at an underground lab.  Be aware that you will need to have a Labs Catalyst on you when activating the warp obelisk, and these will be consumed on leaving.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact will empower the island and unlock a permanent upgrade for all future runs.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED UPGRADE: Unlock Start Location: Labs

name: Construct: Bunker Entrance
description:
Completing this mission will instantly build a new structure on your home island.

Craft the Mouth of the Island from simple tools and common building materials.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

New Structure: Bunker Entrance.  A simple concrete entrance leading down into the lower levels of the island, including a small subterranean chamber.

effect.u_message:
The island seems to be a suitable safe haven for staging future expeditions, but while there's no threat of monsters, it's still harshly exposed to the elements.  Having even minimal covered shelter would go a long way towards helping you rest and recuperate between expeditions.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

New Structure: Bunker Entrance.  A simple concrete entrance leading down into the lower levels of the island, including a small subterranean chamber.

It is done.  A small bunker has been carved into the foundations of this island.  You will find the stairs nearby.
This is only the beginning.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact is used to build a structure on the island.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED BUILD: Bunker Entrance

name: Construct: Main Room 1
description:
Completing this mission will instantly build a new structure on your home island.

Craft a Miner's Cameo from simple tools and common building materials.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

New Structure: Main Room 1.  A hollow chamber beneath the island's center to serve as a multipurpose space, with tons of room to expand.

effect.u_message:
Now that work on the island bunker has begun, a large central room would be ideal.  With all the loot you'll be scavenging on expeditions, it could make a useful storeroom and crafting center.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

New Structure: Main Room 1.  A hollow chamber beneath the island's center to serve as a multipurpose space, with tons of room to expand.
Construction complete.  A central room has been dug out in the bunker beneath the island.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact is used to build a structure on the island.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED BUILD: Main Room 1

name: Construct: Main Room 2
description:
Completing this mission will instantly build a new structure on your home island.

Craft a Hollow Carver from simple tools and common building materials.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

New Structure: Main Room 2.  Expand the central room to fit more loot, furniture, or anything else you may need.

effect.u_message:
The central room would be a lot more useful if it were larger.  Time to get to work.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

New Structure: Main Room 2.  Expand the central room to fit more loot, furniture, or anything else you may need.
Construction complete.  The central room has grown.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact is used to build a structure on the island.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED BUILD: Main Room 2

name: Construct: Main Room 3
description:
Completing this mission will instantly build a new structure on your home island.

Craft a Warped Reinforcement from simple tools and common building materials.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

New Structure: Main Room 3.  Expand the central room to very generous dimensions.

effect.u_message:
The central room is a good start, but it could be much bigger.  Time to get to work.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

New Structure: Main Room 3.  Expand the central room to very generous dimensions.
Construction complete.  The central room has grown even further.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact is used to build a structure on the island.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED BUILD: Main Room 3

name: Construct: Main Room 4
description:
Completing this mission will instantly build a new structure on your home island.

Craft a Cavernous Soul from simple tools and common building materials.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

New Structure: Main Room 4.  Expand the central room to its maximum size.

effect.u_message:
The central room is big.  But not yet big enough.  Time to get to work.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

New Structure: Main Room 4.  Expand the central room to its maximum size.
Construction complete.  The central room is now at its maximum size.

description:
This strange metaphysical artifact is used to build a structure on the island.  Will be used automatically upon crafting, and can only be used once.

ASSOCIATED BUILD: Main Room 4

name: Construct: West Room 1
description:
Completing this mission will instantly build a new structure on your home island.

Craft a Miner's Cameo from simple tools and common building materials.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

New Structure: West Room 1.  A hollow chamber west of the island's center to serve as a multipurpose space, with tons of room to expand.

effect.u_message:
Now that you have corridors snaking beneath your island, you could build rooms in various areas.  The western quadrant might be a good place for another room.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

New Structure: West Room 1.  A hollow chamber to the west of the island's center to serve as a multipurpose space, with tons of room to expand.
Construction complete.  A room has been dug out to the west of the central area in the bunker beneath the island.

name: Construct: West Room Gallery
description:
Completing this mission will instantly build a new structure on your home island.

Craft a Crystalline Glass from simple tools and common building materials.  The Heart of the Island has already placed the recipe inside your mind.

New Structure: West Room Gallery.  Add an enclosed gallery to the western room to allow viewing off the side of the island.

effect.u_message:
The western room is a nice size, but you're on a floating island.  What if you had a place where you could admire the beautiful view without having to worry about the blowing winds?  Time to get to work.
A new recipe has been learned.  Craft this artifact to permanently upgrade the island.

New Structure: West Room Gallery.  Add an enclosed gallery to the western room to allow viewing off the side of the island.
Construction complete.  The western room has now has a viewing gallery.

description:

name: Upgrade: Security Alpha
description:
You have been granted the recipe to craft an Alpha Secure Container.  This little miracle defies the very laws of physics and insists upon its own permanence.  In short, it will give you an integrated pocket you can always access.  The contents of this pocket are completely secure and will not be lost, even if you die and are returned to the island.

You can only ever equip one secure container.

effect.u_message:
You have been granted the recipe to craft an Alpha Secure Container.  This little miracle defies the very laws of physics and insists upon its own permanence.  In short, it will give you an integrated pocket you can always access.  The contents of this pocket are completely secure and will not be lost, even if you die and are returned to the island.

You can only ever equip one secure container.
The strange metaphysical container suddenly snaps inward, clinging to the very core of your being.  Anything stored here will not be lost on death.

name: Upgrade: Security Beta
description:
With the supplied recipe, you will be able to expand the capacity of your secure container.

EMPTY YOUR SECURE CONTAINER FIRST!  Anything left inside when upgrading will be lost forever!

effect.u_message:
With the supplied recipe, you will be able to expand the capacity of your secure container.

EMPTY YOUR SECURE CONTAINER FIRST!  Anything left inside when upgrading will be lost forever!
The strange metaphysical container churns inward with violent force, grinding loudly before suddenly expanding.  Your secure container can now carry more.
